colorScale.legendDescription: Do married men and married women have equal ownership rights to property?

title: Women and men have equal rights to immovable property
subtitle: Womenâ€™s rights to own or administer property aren't legally restricted, and there aren't any gender differences in the legal treatment of spousal property, such as granting the husband administrative control of marital property.
sourceDesc: World Bank, Gender Statistics (based on multiple sources)
